name: Across The Pond: UE4 GameJam
description:
An endless runner VR fitness Game/Prototype meant to challenge the player to keep moving their arms and solve a variety of climbing puzzles.  Features a procedurally generated map  & somewhat procedurally generated obstacles (some are fixed, some depend on map width).  Playable on Oculus Rift.  

Unique Assets made for the game:

  • Young Tim Sweeney--Character Creator 3
  • Procedural Generated Level & Mesh Assets Supporting This Map--multiple paths following a spline.  Restart the game to see a new level  ( didn't have time to implement this on player death)
  • Zipline Sounds 
  • Voiceover sounds on overlapping Tim Sweeneys
  • Climbing Decals & System for climbing decals
  • Follow-Eye Creature
  • 2D Control Art & Title Art

Unique Music Featured In Game But Created Beforehand:

Clutch Trax--Hats Nice

Already Existing Assets:

Eye Mesh (grux)

Paragon assets (walls/climbing things)

Eye Sounds
